  • public class JocdConnAndroid
extends java.lang.Object
    JocdConnAndroid is a companion library for jOCD to provide access to USB devices via Android's USB Host APIs.

      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes the Android Application Context and the Connection Interface in jOCD. It must be executed before any other jOCD library call.
        Parameters:
        context - the android application context
